research_info.research_description: 李四维教授主要从事主、被动大气遥感方法研究及应用，包括快速大气辐射传输模型与大气校正技术，以及大气污染和气候变化的观测、模拟与分析。研究聚焦于卫星多光谱气溶胶特性遥感、机器学习在大气遥感与污染预测中的应用、利用氧气A吸收带进行云、气溶胶与气体遥感，以及大气污染的成因、影响与模拟分析。其团队在遥感反演算法、空气质量建模、地表污染物监测等方面取得系列成果，发表于RSE、EST、JGR、IEEE TGRS等国际主流期刊。

个人简介
教授、博导，副院长，国家级实验教学示范中心主任，国家青年人才项目获得者。主要研究方向为主、被动大气遥感方法研究及应用，快速大气辐射传输模型及大气校正研究，大气污染和气候变化的观测、模拟与分析。主持/参与多项国内外科学研究项目，包括NASA、NOAA、NSF、DoE，国家自然科学基金等项目以及大型联合观测计划；研究成果先后发表在遥感和大气科学领域的主要期刊并受到了国际同行的关注与认可；多次受邀在国际学术会议上做特邀报告，担任国际学术会议筹委会委员、分会主席等职务；担任奥地利自然科学基金评委，遥感学报编委、RS期刊客座编辑以及RSE、EST、GRL、JGR、AMT、IEEE（TGRS）等十余个领域内主要期刊的评审。
Professor, Deputy Dean, Director of National Demonstration Center for Experimental Education (Wuhan University), National High-level Young Talent Program Entrant. Major research areas include studies and applications of active and passive atmospheric remote sensing, fast atmospheric radiative transfer model and atmospheric correction, observation, simulation and investigation on air pollution and climate change. Hosted/participated in numerous domestic and foreign scientific research projects, including NASA, NOAA, NSF, DoE, NSFC and large Field campaigns. More than 40 papers have been published on major journals in the field of remote sensing and atmospheric science. Served as a member of the preparatory committee or the chairman of the branch conference; editorial board member of JRS, RS and reviewer for more than 10 international major journals in the field including RSE, EST, GRL, JGR, AMT and IEEE(TGRS).
科研团队：
课题组科研工作环境优异，氛围和谐、友爱、欢乐，成员努力、上进、特长多样。这里学术讨论活跃，能带给你学术上的思想碰撞，科学技术上的指导以及科研工作所需的硬、软件支持。课题组与国家气象局、环保局、NOAA等国内外科研机构及国内外一流大学皆有学术合作。在这里，你可以通过项目实践提升技能，也可专心埋身于科学研究的海洋，我们因人而异，因材施教。课题组鼓励学术交流，提供出国交流、实习、国际学术会议等机会鼓励团队成员开阔视野、了解国际前沿科学动态。
招收理工背景（如遥感、摄影测量，大气，物理，数学）硕士研究生、博士研究生，长期招收博士后（有独立科研能力），薪酬优厚。欢迎感兴趣的同学加入我们的团队，一起Work hard，Play hard。
Research Team
The research group has excellent working environment and embraces harmonious, friendly, joyful team atmosphere. Team members are hard-working, motivated and have diverse specialties. Here presents an active and welcome ambiance for academic discussion and triggers clashes of academic thoughts. Guidance of science and technology, software and hardware support for research work are solidly supported. The research group establishes academic collaborations with China Meteorological Administration, Ministry of Ecology and Environment, NOAA and other domestic or international research institutions and universities. You can polish your skills through practical projects and dedicate to scientific progresses in the group. We educate in a differentiated manner for each individual. The research group encourages academic exchanges and provides opportunities for abroad exchanges, internships, international conferences to support team members to expand the horizons and grasp the international science advances.
We are looking for motivated master and doctoral students to join us with background in science and engineering (such as remote sensing, photogrammetry, atmospheric science, physics, mathematics). We are also seeking qualified candidates for postdoctoral positions capable to lead independent research with attractive packages. Interested students are welcome to join our team. Let’s work hard, play hard.
目前主要研究内容：
1. 卫星多光谱的气溶胶特性遥感研究
2. 机器学习方法在大气遥感、大气污染中的应用研究
3. 利用氧气A吸收带的云、气溶胶、气体遥感研究
4. 大气污染的观测、模拟及成因、影响分析
Key Research Areas
1.     Ground-based and satellite-based remote sensing of aerosol, cloud and polluted gases properties
2.     Machine learning applications on estimations and prediction of atmospheric constitutes
3.     Radiative transfer simulation and remote sensing application using O2-A band
4.     Model simulation of air pollution and emission
